abstract: Dick Ebersol, who left NBC in May after a conflict with the network’s new management from the Comcast Corporation, will be rejoining the network as a special adviser to NBC’s sports.
snippet: Dick Ebersol, who left NBC in May after a conflict with the network’s new management from the Comcast Corporation, will be rejoining the network as a special adviser to NBC’s sports.
lead_paragraph: The absence of Dick Ebersol from his long-time home at NBC Sports proved to be unexpectedly brief. He will be rejoining the production efforts at NBC’s sports as a special adviser to the network, several senior NBC executives said this week.

headline.main: Ebersol to Rejoin NBC Sports as a Senior Adviser

byline.original: By Bill Carter and Richard Sandomir
